name: Lord Byron
description: A Single Stake Pool helping to decentralize Cardano while educating, creating & giving back! Lord Byron was registered March 3, 2021 and created its first block March 12, 2021. All pools have the same 'dimensions'. Why stake with an overcrowded/oversaturated pool when you can stake in a nice comfortable pool, like Lord Byron? Come on in, the water's fine! :)
